definitions.definition: The feature of a video game where multiple human players play simultaneously.
examples: I just heard that the game will have multiplayer when it comes out!
He always loved to play multiplayer games with his friends.

definitions.definition: Video game players who play multiplayer games.

main_definition: ( games , uncountable ) The feature of a video game where multiple human players play simultaneously.
secondary_definitions: ( in the plural ) Video game players who play multiplayer games.
